data.topics_covered: Data Science, Data Products, Data Science Pipeline
data.description: What is data science? What kind of work do data scientists do? How are data products made? What is the data science pipeline?

data.instructor: Rebecca Bilbro, Pri Oberoi, Sasan Bahadaran
data.software_needed: Git, GitHub, Sublime or Atom.io, Terminal or Powershell
data.description: Learn to work effectively on a data team and never lose your project again! Introduction to version control using Git software and the GitHub website.

data.topics_covered: Basic Syntax, List Comprehension, Packages, Looping, Pickling, Package Installation, Package Importing
data.software_needed: Git, GitHub, Python, Sublime or Atom.io, Terminal or Powershell
data.description: Learn basic syntax and how to get up running with Python 2.7.

data.topics_covered: Design Principles, Color Theory, Adobe Programs and their uses, PhotoShop, UX Design, Mobile Design
data.description: Learn the basic principles and concepts of design such as color theory, typography, branding, user experience design, and mobile design. Practice what you learn in photoshop, and walk away with a design by the end of the class.

data.topics_covered: RStudio, Basic Syntax, Data Frames, Loading and Writing Data, Summary Statistics, Regression
data.description: Introductory course that covers basic R syntax, input and output, and basic statistical analysis

data.topics_covered: Data Loading using R, Summary Statistics, Investigative Correlations
data.software_needed: Git, GitHub, Terminal or Powershell, R, RStudio, Sublime or Atom.io
data.course_name: Intro to Data Analysis with R
data.description: Given a dataset online, use R to load the data, compute summary statistics, and investigate correlations.
data.recommended_prerequisite: Intro to Data Science, Intro to R

data.topics_covered: GGPlot2, Shiny, Plotly, Leaflet, RMarkDown, RStudio
data.software_needed: Git, GitHub, Terminal or Powershell, R, RStudio, Sublime or Atom.io, GGPlot2, Shiny, Plotly, Leaflet, RMarkDown
data.description: Overview of internal R data visualization tools as well as use of Shiny, Leaflet, and Plotly for interactive visualizations.

data.software_needed: Git, GitHub, Python, Sublime or Atom.io, Terminal or Powershell
data.description: Download, explore, and wrangle the Titanic passenger manifest dataset with an eye toward developing a predictive model for survival

data.topics_covered: Supervised Learning, Unsupervised Learning, Scikit-Learn, Dimensionality Reduction, Preprocessing
data.software_needed: Git, GitHub, Python, Sublime or Atom.io, Terminal or Powershell
data.description: Basic introduction to machine learning: what it is, how it works, and how to get started with machine learning in Python using the Scikit-learn API.
data.recommended_prerequisite: Intro to Python, Data Wrangling with Pandas

data.software_needed: Chrome Browser with Postman extension, Python, Sublime or Atom.io

data.instructor: Natassja Linzau and Mark Brown II
data.topics_covered: Strings, Integers, Floats, and Equality; Loops, Methods, Functions, jQuery, Classes, and Objects
data.description: Introductory course that covers basic JS concepts and makes use of free online tools for programming in JS with real-life examples.

data.topics_covered: Data Science Pipeline, Data Analysis, Data Wrangling, Machine Learning, Data Visualization
data.software_needed: Git, GitHub, Python, Sublime or Atom.io, Terminal or Powershell
data.description: Anscombe's quartet teaches us that data visualizations have a lot more utility than in just presenting results at the end of a project -- visual analytics can play a critical role in many phases of the data science pipeline, from analysis to wrangling to machine learning. Learn how you can deploy easy visualization tools in Python to boost your analytical power and get better results.

data.recommended_prerequisite: Intro to Python, Intro to Git and Github

data.course_name: Basic Data Ingestion with requests and beautifulsoup
